Class StackAdvisorResourceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.BaseProvider

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObservableResourceProvider, ResourceProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecommendationResourceProvider, ValidationResourceProvider

    public abstract class StackAdvisorResourceProvider
extends ReadOnlyResourceProvider
    Abstract superclass for recommendations and validations.
